name: ci-cd-playground
description: Interactive CI/CD playground with live pipeline visualization

scripts.test: echo "🧪 Running comprehensive test suite..." && sleep 2 && echo "✅ All tests passed successfully!"
scripts.lint: echo "🔍 Running linter checks..." && sleep 1 && echo "✅ Code linting completed successfully!"
scripts.build: echo "🏗️ Building production artifacts..." && sleep 3 && echo "✅ Build completed successfully!"
scripts.deploy: echo "🚀 Deploying to production environment..." && sleep 2 && echo "✅ Deployment completed successfully!"

author: CI/CD Demo
